Description: Black-topped beaker vase, with slightly everted rim, exterior coated with red and blackened slip and burnished.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna (London, 1911), p. 15; pl. xxiii.22k. Pot visible on side of grave in pl. iv.17. Marked H.10 (B) on base.
Condition: fair (chipped at rim), base worn from use.
